point1: As a full-stack web developer, Zhonghui Duan has progressed from a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering and Automation to a Master's degree in Information & Communication Technology, with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, and Node.js.
point2: Notable projects include the Contemporary Art Gallery (PHD Group) website, built from scratch using Next.js and Sanity, and a CRUD app with Node, Express, and MongoDB, showcasing his skills in backend development and authentication.
point3: Zhonghui Duan's technical strengths lie in his proficiency in programming languages like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, as well as his expertise in frameworks like React, Next.js, and Node.js, and databases like MongoDB.
point4: With a background in Electrical Engineering and Automation, Zhonghui Duan demonstrates a solid understanding of the intersection of technology and art, as seen in his work on the Contemporary Art Gallery (PHD Group) website and his passion for creating interactive experiences.
point5: A motivated and creative full-stack web developer, Zhonghui Duan stands out with his ability to build complex web applications from scratch, leveraging his skills in Next.js, Sanity, and JavaScript to deliver engaging user experiences.
